# Recommended because some non-commonly-used modules/examples depend on those packages.

-f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch_stable.html
tensorflow
torch == 1.10.0+cu111
torchvision == 0.11.1+cu111
pytorch-lightning >= 1.5.0, < 1.6.0
lightgbm
onnx
peewee
graphviz
gym
tianshou >= 0.4.1
timm >= 0.5.4
